title: Custom PLA Print
description: Custom 3D printing made easy. Tell us your idea, wants and needs, and we'll design and print with precision and care. Unique parts, prototypes, gifts, and more — all printed by ManiaPrint.
details: Standard PLA material in various colors with fine finishing. Typical turnaround 2-3 days.

title: Custom Nametags
description: Make your name stand out with a custom 3D-printed keychain! Ideal for birthdays, school bags, or team gifts. Each tag is personalized, durable, and printed locally by ManiaPrint.
details: Printed using a range of colors and fonts to create your unique nametag. Around 1-3 day turnaround.

title: Custom Pet Nametags
description: Custom 3D-printed tags to keep your pet stylish, safe, and easy to identify.
details: Made from durable, lightweight PLA plastic with your choice of name and color including a keyring. 1-3 day turnaround.

title: Phone Stand
description: Sleek 3D-printed phone stand designed for everyday use. Ideal for watching videos, video calls, or displaying your phone — compact, stable, and stylish.
details: Contact us for custom pricing on large format prints. Various materials available. Lead time depends on project complexity.

title: Mini dragon Keychain
description: Small 3D-printed flexi dragon keychain with movable joints. Fun, durable, and perfect for adding a playful touch to your keys or bag, or a cool unique gift.
details: Crafted from durable PLA plastic with flexible joints that move freely. 1-2 day turnaround

title: MAGSAFE Phone Stand
description: iPhone magsafe phone stand to charge on your desk - charger not included.
details: Crafted from durable PLA plastic to use easily with an apple magsafe charger. 1-2 day turnaround
